name: Active Defense
desc: You defend yourself with a weapon, mitigating an incoming blow.
trigger: You are Attacked, take Damage, or gain Status.
effect: Gain 1 _Fleeting_ _Defense_ of your choice. You may choose to gain the _Parry_ effect of a _Wielded_, undamaged piece of _Equipment_. After resolving this, gain _Reeling_ 1.
special: If, after resolving all effects, the total Damage is greater than the _Durability_ of the _Equipment_ it gains _Sundered_.
boost:
Choose any:
* 2 _Momentum_: Gain the _Parry_ effect of a _Sundered_ Weapon.
* 2 _Momentum_: Gain the _Parry_ benefits of two _Wielded_ _Weapons_ against the triggering _Attack_.

name: Aftershock
desc: You amplify the impact of a foe hitting the ground, creating a resonant quake.
trigger: A foe in temporary _Earthen_ _Rough Terrain_ created by a _Quaking Earth_ ability is knocked _Prone_.
effect:
Choose one:
* Inflict _Vulnerable_ 1 in a _Burst_ 1 around the Target.
* Remove up to 3 _Vulnerable_ from the _Target_, dealing 2 Damage for each.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is now none and Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance. Resolve both effects, then inflict _Reeling_ 1 [_Avoidable_] in a _Burst_ 1.

name: Aggressive Orders
desc: You urge a nearby all on, allowing them a strike.
effect: Choose an ally within Range. Grant them a _Free Turn_ where they may make a _Minor Attack_ and _Step_, but must Target a creature within Range 3 of you.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, your ally may either make a _Major Attack_ instead of a _Minor Attack_ or a _Reposition_ _Move_ instead of _Step_. This cost may be paid by you, the Target, or split between the two of you.

name: Aim
desc: You sacrifice mobility to take the chance to aim, preparing the perfect strike.
reqs: Have not used _Movement_ this _Turn_ and have _Movement_ this _Turn_.
effect: Gain a +1 _Bonus_ to the first _Attack Roll_ you make before moving this _Turn_. Decrease your _Movement_ this _Turn_ by one tier.

name: Ambush
desc: You move forward rapidly out of the shroud of shadows, launching a vicious assault against an unsuspecting foe.
reqs: Must be _Veiled_.
effect: Any creatures that see you as _Obscured_ at the start of your _Turn_ see you as _Obscured_ for the remainder of this _Turn_. Make a single _Light_/_Versatile_ _Minor Attack_ against a creature that sees you as _Obscured_.
special: Do not remove _Veiled_ until the end of this _Turn_ if it would normally be removed.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: You have _Advantage_ on an _Attack_ you make this _Turn_. You may repeat this _Boost_ as many times as you wish.

name: Basic Feint
desc: You feint one way before attacking another, providing yourself an advantage.
reqs: Single-Target _Melee_ Attack.
effect: Before making the Attack, inflict _Reeling_ 1, _Exposed_ 1.

name: Basic Flourish
desc: You disengage from an attack artfully, attempting to knock a foe's weapons far away.
reqs: You complete a Single-Target _Melee_ Attack against a foe.
effect: Inflict _Impaired_ 2/_Disarmed_ [2 _Defense_].

name: Basic Sunder
desc: You focus an attack on breaking a foe's armor or guard.
reqs: You make a Single-Target _Melee_ _Versatile_/_Heavy_ Attack against a foe.
effect: Add [_Overwhelming_ 1].
boost:
1 _Momentum_: In addition, choose one before making your _Attack Roll_:
* If the Damage dealt with this _Attack_ is greater than or equal to the _Durability_ of the creature's _Armor_, inflict _Shred_ 1.
* If the Damage dealt with this _Attack_ is greater than or equal to the _Durability_ of a _Shield_ _Wielded_ by the creature, _Damage_ it.

name: Bastion's Fury
desc: You unleash a mighty strike against a foe that dared to ignore you.
reqs: Target must be a creature that Attacked one of your allies this _Round_.
effect: Gain a +1 _Bonus_ on the Attack and, on a _Graze_+, add _Marked_.
special: If the Attack is _Area_, apply the effect only on those that attacked an ally.

name: Building Fury
desc: You snarl through a foe's assault, preparing to unleash violent vengeance.
trigger: You are Attacked, take Damage or gain Status.
reqs: Must be _Charging_.
effect: Gain 1 _Fleeting_ _Poise_/_Grit_ and add _Enraged_ 1 to the triggering effect. When you resolve the _Charged_ effect, you may treat all creatures in the area as the target of your rage. After fully resolving the triggering effect, gain _Vigor_ 2.

name: Buzzing Flourish
desc: You use the cover of an attack to fly forward, avoiding retaliation.
trigger: You _Hit_+ with an Attack against an adjacent foe.
effect: Immediately _Step_. If it is _Phase_ 3 or earlier, add [_Safe_].

name: Cunning Strike
desc: You exploit an opening in a foe's defenses to drive your attack deep.
reqs:
You make a Single-Target _Light_/_Versatile_ Attack against an _Exposed_ target and at least one of the following is true:
* Have _Advantage_ on the _Attack_.
* Have an ally who is adjacent to the Target.
effect: If you remove _Exposed_ for a _Bonus_, gain a +2 _Bonus_ instead of +1. After resolving the Attack, inflict your choice of _Hobbled_/_Reeling_ 1.

name: Chemical Warfare
desc: A blast of toxic gasses.
effect: Create a _Cone_ 2 of _Toxic Gas_ within Range 6. This gas is removed at the end of the _Round_.

name: Chip Damage
desc: When foes strike your armor vicious bits of shrapnel punish their efforts.
trigger: You would take Damage while you have Stone Armor or used an _Earth_ _Defensive_ _Reaction_.
effect: Deal 2 Stab Damage [_Avoidable_] in a _Burst_ 1.
special: If the Guard of your Stone Armor is reduced by the triggering Attack, cost is instead None. If it destroyed your Stone Armor, deal +4 _Bonus Damage_.

name: Coiled Guard
desc: You make yourself a miniscule target as you prepare for an assault.
effect: Until the end of the next _Phase_, gain _Veiled_. Creatures in a _Hazard_ you created always treat you as _Lightly Obscured_, even to _Secondary Senses_.
special: You may use this _Action_ while _Charging_.

name: Corral
desc: You make your way forward, reorienting creatures as you go.
effect: Three times during this Move you may inflict _Push_/_Pull_ 1. You may _Pull_ at _Range_ 2 if you target a creature that you just left adjacency with.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Inflict an additional _Push_/_Pull_ 1. You may repeat this _Boost_.

name: Deadeye
desc: You use the high ground to your advantage, unleashing an unavoidable strike.
reqs: You make a Single-Target _Ranged_ Attack against a foe at a lower _Elevation_.
effect: Gain a +1 _Bonus_ on this _Attack_ and add [_Arcing_]. You may treat your _Total Height_ as 1 higher when determining _Obstruction_.

name: Duelist's Invitation
desc: With careful positioning and exceptional technique you prepare for single combat.
reqs: Triggering _Attack_ must have inflicted _Marked_ on a single target.
effect:
While the Target is _Marked_ by you, gain a Duel Counter, which starts at 0 and has a maximum of 6. Different actions may increase or decrease the counter, as follows:
* Whenever you Attack the target, are attacked by the target, or the _Round_ ends, increase it by 1, to a maximum of 6.
* If an ally damages or inflicts a condition on the target, decrease it by 2.
* If you end your _Turn_ not adjacent to the target, reduce it by 2.
* If you deal Damage to or inflict a condition on a creature other than the Target, reset the counter to 0. 

Whenever you would spend _Momentum_ against your Target you may reduce the Duel Counter to reduce the _Momentum_ cost by an equivalent amount.

name: Expert Improviser
desc: You strike a foe, breaking your weapon in the most opportune way.
reqs: Must be using a _Fragile_ _Improvised Weapon_.
effect: On a _Hit_+, add _Blind_ (2 _Any_) until the end of this _Phase_, or _Vulnerable_ 1 on a _Graze_-.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: After resolving this attack, create an _Opportune Weapon_ in a space adjacent to the target. This weapon has all the same traits as the original, but decreases in size by one. A _Large Improvised_ Weapon would become a _Medium Improvised_ Weapon, for example. You may only use this _Boost_ if the original _Opportune Weapon_ was an _Improvised Weapon_.

name: Darting Posture
desc: You adopt a mobile posture, creating a state of constant movement.
effect: Becoming _Guarding_. While _Guarding_ in this way you are not _Hobbled_, you may Move 1 [_Safe_] at the end of each _Phase_, you gain 1 _Fleeting_ _Reflex_ each _Turn_, and creatures that end their _Turn_ next to you gain _Vulnerable_ 1.

name: Disengage
desc: You focus your efforts on moving away from hostile foes.
effect: Add [_Safe_] to all _Movement_ this _Turn_.

name: Distracting Step
desc: You step through a foe, barely skirting their defenses and leaving them reeling.
effect: Inflict _Reeling_ 1 on any creature who's space you move through this _Turn_.

name: Dodge
desc: You slip away from an incoming attack, avoiding the brunt of the blow.
trigger: You are Attacked.
effect: _Step_ and use the _Tumble_ _Manuever_ at no cost. If you do not _Move_ at least one space, this _Maneuver_ instantly fails. If the Attack was Single-Target, add [_Glancing_]. If it was _Area_ and you are no longer in the _Area_, add [_Glancing_]. After resolving all other effects gain _Prone_, _Reeling_ 1.

name: Draw/Stow
desc: You grab an unattended item or change your equipment.
cost: 1 _Momentum_, or 0 _Momentum_ if the Equipment has the _Quickdraw_ property.
effect:
Choose one:
* Create an _Opening_. _Equip_/_Wield_ (if you have the appropriate _Open Hands_) a single unattended, adjacent piece of _Equipment_.
* _Equip_ a _Wielded_ piece of _Equipment_.
* _Wield_ (if you have the appropriate _Open Hands_) an _Equipped_ piece of _Equipment_.
special: Before _Wielding_ an item, you may choose to stop _Wielding_ _Equipment_ of your choice, placing them unattended in your current or adjacent spaces.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Do not create an _Opening_.

name: Dual Fangs
desc: You prepare a vicious strike with multiple avenues, leaving multiple options open.
reqs: Single-Target _Melee_ Attack.
effect: Instead of immediately resolving the attack, become _Charging_ and create two _Hazards_ within _Reach_. At the end of this _Phase_, resolve the Attack against any Targets in these _Hazards_. If there is a target in both spaces, add [_Glancing_]. If there is only a Target in one space, inflict _Exposed_ 1 before resolving the Attack.
special: Increase the _Reach_ of this Attack by 1.

name: Duelist's Defense
desc: You focus your defenses on a singular target, providing an impenetrable defense.
effect: Become _Guarding_. While _Guarding_, all attacks by the Target take a -1 _Penalty_ against you, and you gain 1 _Guard_ against them. Additionally, treat your _Reeling_ as half its current value when using _Reactions_ against the Target, but treat your _Reeling_ as 2 higher for all other creatures. If you have a creature adjacent to you other than the Target, you do not benefit from this effect, but remain _Guarding_. Lose this _Guarding_ if you deal Damage to or inflict Status on a creature other than the Target.

name: Engage
desc: You obstruct a foe's movement, making it difficult for them to advance.
trigger: A creature of your Size or smaller moves adjacent to you with Movement without [_Rush_] or [_Leaping_].
effect: The creature must pay 2 _Momentum_. If they do not, their Movement immediately ends and you may inflict _Marked_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, Trigger is 'A creature your Size + 1 or smaller'.

name: Enhanced Strike
desc: You place additional power into an attack, converting momentum to damage.
reqs: You _Graze_+ with an Attack.
effect: Deal +1 _Bonus Damage_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, deal +2 _Bonus Damage_.

name: Flank
desc: You launch a quick assault, diverting a foe's attention so an ally can strike.
trigger: An adjacent foe is Attacked.
effect: The targeted foe must pay 1 _Poise_ or else the triggering Attack gains a +1 _Bonus_.

name: Flitter
desc: You began to swiftly move about, making yourself a hard target.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins.
effect: All Attacks against you this _Phase_ take a -1 _Penalty_. Once this _Phase_ you may take a _Free Turn_ to _Step_ [_Safe_].

name: Floating Escape
desc: You slip just out of a foe's reach as they strike, defending yourself.
trigger: You are Attacked, take Damage or gain Status.
effect: Either gain 1 _Fleeting_ _Reflex_ and reduce the _Attack Roll_ by 1 or gain 2 _Fleeting_ _Reflex_. You may _Step_ [_Safe_] as a part of this _Reaction_, but gain _Hobbled_ 1 if you do so. Gain _Reeling_ 1.
special: If the trigger came about due to an _Opening_ add [_Glancing_].

name: Free Run
desc: You use an obstacle to accelerate yourself, moving further still.
trigger: You move adjacent to an Obstacle of Size 1 or greater.
effect: You may Move 1 [_Safe_, _Leaping_] then _Step_ [_Safe_, _Breach_].

name: Gap in the Armor!
desc: You call out a hole in an opponent's defenses, allowing an ally to strike true.
trigger: An ally attacks a foe with _Insight_.
effect: Before resolving the Attack remove up to 3 _Insight_ from the Target. Add _Dazed_ _0/0/1/2_ and [_Pierce_ X] to the Attack, where X is the _Insight_ removed.

name: Guiding Hand
desc: You gently push an ally out of harm's way, guiding them to a safer locale.
effect: Choose an adjacent ally and inflict _Slide_ 2.
boost: You may instead make a _Minor Attack_ against an ally. Do not deal Damage and only inflict status of your choice. You must inflict any _Forced Movement_ caused by the attack.

name: Hide
desc: You conceal yourself, limiting enemies' ability to strike you.
reqs: Must be adjacent to an _Obstacle_ of at least your size or be in a _Obscured_ space.
effect: You become _Veiled_. This lasts until you Move, target another creature with any effect, or you no longer fulfill the requirements to use this Manuever.

name: Improvised Combo
desc: An impromptu strike, often used to set up an incoming blow.
effect: Make a _Minor Attack_.

name: Inspire
desc: You call out to an ally, filling them with the drive to push on.
trigger: A _Phase_ begins.
effect: Choose any ally within Range. Grant them _Vigor_ 2 and 2 _Fleeting_ _Poise_. They may immediately _Recover_, but may only spend the _Poise_ granted by this ability.

name: Intercept
desc: You strike an attack aside, stopping it before it reaches an ally.
trigger: An adjacent ally is Attacked, takes Damage, or gain Status.
effect: Your ally gains 1 _Fleeting_ _Defense_ of your choice. You may then grant them the _Parry_ effect of a _Wielded_, undamaged piece of _Equipment_. After resolving this, gain _Reeling_ 1.
special: If, after resolving all effects, the total Damage is greater than the _Durability_ of the _Equipment_ it gains _Sundered_.
boost:
Choose any:
* 2 _Momentum_: Grant the _Parry_ effect of a _Sundered_ Weapon.
* 2 _Momentum_: Grant the _Parry_ benefits of two _Wielded_ _Weapons_ against the triggering _Attack_.

name: Interact
desc: You engage with the battlefield, whether that be finding a new weapon or removing a trap.
effect: Resolve the Interact Effect of an Obstacle or Effect in an adjacent space, paying the cost listed for the effect.

name: Jagged Earth
desc: You churn the spikes beneath a foe, forcing them to choose how to defend.
trigger: A creature on an _Earthen_ _Jagged_ space is Attacked.
effect: The Target chooses: Either they immediately suffer the end of turn effect of _Jagged_, or their Attacker gains a +1 _Bonus_.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance, and Cost is instead None. Instead, inflict _Reeling_ 1, _Vulnerable_ 2, grant your ally a +1 _Bonus_, and resolve the end of turn effect of _Jagged_.

name: Kill Shot
desc: You take a calculated shot, focusing on efficacy over accuracy.
trigger: You make a Ranged Attack against a creature with _Insight_.
effect: Make the _Attack_ with _Advantage_. As a part of this Attack you may remove up to 5 _Insight_, dealing +1 Damage to that creature per _Insight_ removed in this way. If the _Attack_ was a _Crit_, instead deal +2 Damage per _Insight_ removed.
special: If you already have _Advantage_, this instead costs only 1 _Momentum_

name: Rock Lock
desc: You pull residual stone towards you, creating a drawing field of stone armor.
effect: Gain 2 _Vigor_. Inflict _Pull_ 2 in a _Burst_ 2 and, until the end of the _Phase_, treat yourself as 1 Size larger for all effects, reduce the cost of the _Engage_ _Maneuver_ by 1, and you may trigger it at a Range of 2.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance, and Cost is instead None. _Summon_ your Spirit in or adjacent to an _Earth_ _Source_. Grant them 4 _Vigor_, then resolve the remaining Effect on them. Instead treat them as Size 1 or 1 Size larger, whichever is greater.

name: Luring Step
desc: You taunt your foe forward, drawing them further into your trap.
effect: Choose an adjacent Target _Marked_ by you that is not _Stuck_. The Target must choose; they can either Move with you, adding [_Safe_] but must end their Movement adjacent to you, or immediately gain _Exposed_ 2, _Reeling_ 2.
special: Add [_Safe_] to your Movement against your chosen _Marked_ Target. You may move away from them this _Turn_, ignoring the normal _Marked_ limitations.

name: Impromptu Trap
desc: You hazardously array a nearby weapon, repurposing it into a trap.
effect: Choose an adjacent _Opportune Weapon_. Remove it and replace it with a Size 1 _Hazard_. The first time a creature moves into this space remove the _Hazard_ and make an Attack against the creature with the Weapon you removed. This Attack has _Advantage_ and ignores _Speed Penalty_.

name: Leap
desc: You leap forward, hurdling over hazards and other dangers.
effect: The next X spaces you Move, where X is up to your Jump Value, is [_Leaping_] Movement. This Movement must be taken in a straight line, and this Movement may not be broken up in any way.

name: Localized Tremor
desc: You set your stance, causing the earth around you to quake violently.
effect: Until you leave your current space, _Earthen_ spaces in the _Area_ are considered _Rough_. Additionally, any creature that end their _Turn_ in one of these spaces or enters one of these spaces gains _Exposed_ 1 (maximum once per _Turn_).
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, _Area_ is _Burst_ 2.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The _Cost_ is now none and Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance. Choose an unoccupied _Earthen_ space within _Range_. _Summon_ your spirit to that space, then resolve the _Effect_, treating your spirit as the user. While _Summoned_ in this way your spirit may not willingly move. Your spirit remains _Summoned_ until they leave that space, you spend 1 _Momentum_ as an _Action_ to end the _Summon_, or the _Round_ ends.

name: Lock Down
desc: A prepared shot that is taken at the opportune moment.
trigger: You successfully _Grab_ with an _Attack_.
effect: Add _Impaired_ 2 and gain a +1 _Bonus_ to the next opposed _Grab_ roll this _Round_.

name: Marching Tune
desc: You urge an ally forward, allowing them to more swiftly respond.
effect: Choose any ally within Range. Grant them _Joyful_ 1, _Accelerate_.

name: Mark Prey
desc: You focus your attention on a single creature, ignoring all other potential targets.
effect: Choose a creature within Range and inflict _Insight_ 2 on them. Until that creature is _Defeated_ or you use this _Action_ again deal +2 _Damage_ to that creature and add [_Pierce_ 1] if they have _Insight_, but you have _Disadvantage_ on all Attacks against other creatures.

name: Mark Target
desc: You focus your attention on a single target, setting them up for a deadly blow.
effect: Choose a foe within Range. Inflict _Insight_ 2, _Reeling_ 1. If you do not see them as _Obstructed_/_Obscured_ from your current position, inflict an additional _Insight_ 1. After resolving this effect, you may convert any amount of _Insight_ on the target into _Exposed_.

name: Mark the Path
desc: You trailblaze forward, finding a safe path for allies as you do so.
effect: Once during your Move, you may choose an adjacent space and place a _Blessing_ in it. While the _Blessing_ persists, allies may ignore the _Terrain_ in that space when moving through it. Any ally that enters the _Blessing_ gains 2 _Momentum_. Remove the _Blessing_ if the _Terrain_ in the space changes.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Place an additional _Blessing_. You may repeat this option, increasing the cost by 1 each time.

name: Marking Strike
desc: You get in close with a foe, forcing their attention towards you.
reqs: You make a Single-Target _Melee_ Attack against a foe.
effect: Add _Marked_, _Impaired_ _0/0/0/1_.

name: Outmaneuver
desc: You use your speed to force an opening against a foe.
effect: If this Target has not taken a _Turn_ this _Round_, gain a +1 _Bonus_ and you may remove an additional _Vulnerable_.

name: Opportunity Attack
desc: You capitalize on the opening created by a repositioning foe, moving to strike while you can.
trigger: An enemy within your _Reach_ creates an _Opening_.
effect: Make a Single-Target _Minor Attack_ against the triggering creature. You must use a _Minor Attack_ with a _Reach_ capable of attacking the Target.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, use a Single-Target _Major Attack_.

name: Overrun
desc: You run bodily through a foe, powering through them without breaking stride.
trigger: You enter a creature's space with [_Breach_] Movement.
effect: Make a _Minor Attack_ with the [_Body_] keyword against the triggering creature. If the Attack would inflict _Push_, you may instead inflict _Angled Push_. Add _Vulnerable_ _0/0/1/2_ and on a _Hit_+ that creature takes a -1 _Penalty_ on Attacks against you this _Turn_.
special: You may only trigger this _Reaction_ against a given creature once per _Turn_.

name: Pack Punishment
desc: You punish a foe as they attempt to defend themselves.
trigger: A foe within Range 3 uses a _Defensive_ _Reaction_.
effect: Make a _Minor Attack_ against the Target, resolving it instantly. Add _Vulnerable_ _1/1/2/3_.

name: Plate Lock
desc: You solidify the plates of your armor, sacrificing mobility to become unstoppable.
trigger: You are Attacked, take Damage or gain Status.
effect: Gain 2 _Guard_ and 2 _Fleeting_ _Grit_ against this Attack, then gain _Reeling_ 1. You may not use an _Action_ or _Technique_ this _Phase_.
special: Cost is ([_Reeling_]/2) _Momentum_ if you have Stone Armor.

name: Powerful Flourish
desc: You collect yourself with excessive force, staggering nearby foes.
trigger: You complete the final _Attack_ in a _Charged_ effect.
effect: Inflict _Reeling_ 1, _Exposed_ 1 in a _Burst_ 1.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, inflict it on all Targets of the triggering attack.

name: Prepare
desc: You catch your breath, collecting yourself and preparing for battle.
effect: Gain 2 _Momentum_.
special: You may use this Action more than once per _Round_.

name: Prideful Boast
desc: You let out a challenge, drawing the attention of nearby foes.
effect: Inflict _Marked_, _Enraged_ 1 on foes in the _Area_, then gain _Vigor_ 4.

name: Prideful Clash
desc: When a nearby foe insults your pride by attacking another you can't help but retaliate.
trigger: A foe within Range attacks an ally.
effect: Make a Single-Target _Minor Attack_ against the triggering creature. On a _Graze_+, grant the triggering ally _Courageous_ 1.
special: You have _Advantage_ on this _Attack_ if you have _Marked_ the Target or you are the target of their rage.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, make a _Major Attack_.

name: Provoke
desc: You draw the ire of a nearby foe with insults or guile, forcing them to focus on you.
effect: Inflict your choice of _Exposed_/_Enraged_ 1 on the creature.
special: You may use this _Stunt_ more than once per _Turn_, but each successive use against the same creature costs 1 more.

name: Push Off
desc: You put your head down and charge, slamming into a nearby foe.
reqs: Must have Moved at least 1 space with [_Breach_] Movement.
effect: 1 _Momentum_: If this _Movement_ has [_Rush_], after inflicting the _Push_ you may change the direction of your Movement and immediately move 2 spaces in that direction.
special: You may use this _Stunt_ more than once per _Turn_, but reset the number of spaces you have moved with [_Breach_] Movement after each use when determining the Requirement and Effect.
boost: Inflict _Angled Push_ 2 on an adjacent target. Add _Forceful_ if you have moved at least 3 spaces with [_Breach_] Movement.

name: Raise Guard
desc: You adopt a defensive stance, warding yourself against harm.
effect: You become _Guarding_. Create an _Arc_ with a _Range_ of _Self_. Gain 1 _Guard_ against all effects that originate from or pass through one of those spaces. At the end of each of your _Turns_ you may move this _Arc_.
special: As a part of this _Action_ you may also choose an undamaged, _Wielded_ piece of _Equipment_. It becomes _Occupied_ so long as you are _Guarding_, but you gain its _Parry_ benefit against all effects that pass through or originate in the _Arc_. End _Guarding_ if you are _Disarmed_ of _Equipment_ used for this _Action_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: You may choose a piece of _Sundered_ _Equipment_.

name: Rally
desc: You take a moment to collect yourself and restore your ability to fight.
effect:
_Refresh_ and choose one:
* You or an adjacent ally _Recovers_.
* You may attempt to escape a _Grab_ without paying the initial _Momentum_ cost.
* Reduce _Reeling_ by 1 on yourself, your spirit, or an adjacent ally.
* Remove _Prone_ from an adjacent ally.

You may resolve these effects in any order.
special: You may use this Action more than once per _Round_.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: Add the below options to the choices above:
  * Move is instead _Step_.
* 1 _Momentum_: Gain 1 _Fleeting_ _Defense_ of your choice. You may repeat this Boost.

name: Rending Assault
desc: You make an attack more focused on disrupting a foe's defenses than physically harming them.
reqs: Attack deals Damage.
effect: Choose a single Target of this Attack. This _Attack_ deals half Damage. Until the end of the _Round_, allies may remove an additional _Vulnerable_ when attacking this creature.
special:
* If this is a _Minor Attack_, add _Vulnerable_ _0/1/2/3_, _Reeling_ _0/0/1/1_.
* If this is a _Major Attack_, add _Vulnerable_ _1/2/3/5_, _Reeling_ _0/1/2/3_.

name: Reorient
desc: You swiftly move, adjusting your footing before taking a more serious action.
special: You may use this Action more than once per _Round_.

name: Resonant Quake
desc: You cause your quake to resonante with nearby obstacles, potentially shattering them.
reqs: Must be _Groundsource_.
effect: Deal Damage to all _Obstacles_ hit by this Attack equal to 2 + the current _Phase_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Deal +2 Damage. You may repeat this _Boost_.

name: Reverse Erosion
desc: You gather stone from around you, forging layer of stone over your form.
effect: Choose an _Earthen_ Obstacle with 8 or less _Durability_ or a _Jagged_ space within _Range_ 2. _Destroy_ it, gain 4 _Vigor_, and 1 _Momentum_.
boost: 3 _Momentum_: Restore 1 _Guard_ to your Stone Armor.
special: You may use this Action more than once per _Round_.

name: Run Down
desc: You put your head down and charge, slamming into a nearby foe.
effect: At the end of this _Movement_ make a [_Body_] _Minor Attack_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: You have +1 _Guard_ for this _Movement_.

name: Safe Harbor
desc: You calm the spirits of nearby water, creating a safe realm for your allies.
effect: Until the end of the _Round_ you and your allies may choose to ignore the effects of _Watery_ _Terrain_ in the _Area_ (but must still _Swim_ if applicable) and may move through _Water Veil_ spaces without expending additional Movement. Additionally, _Watery_ _Terrain_ within the _Area_ is considered _Fortified_ _Terrain_ for you and your allies.
special: When you use this _Action_ you may _Draw_ 2 within Range 4, then immediately create X _Wet_ spaces within Range, where X is the number of spaces _Drawn_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, _Area_ is _Burst_ 2. Instead, _Draw_ 3.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is now none and Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance. Choose an unoccupied _Watery_ space within Range. _Summon_ your spirit to that space, then resolve the Effect, treating your spirit as the user and applying the Boost at no cost. Your spirit remains _Summoned_ until you spend 1 _Momentum_ as an _Action_ to end the _Summon_ or the _Round_ ends.

name: Scathing Words
desc: You unleash a string of insults, disrupting and disorienting a foe.
effect: Choose a foe within Range. Inflict _Anguished_/_Enraged_ 1, _Reeling_ 1. If one of their allies was defeated this _Phase_, instead inflict _Anguished_/_Enraged_ 2, _Reeling_ 1.

name: Scouting
desc: You cast a watchful eye towards a foe, finding holes in their defenses.
effect: Choose a creature within Range. Inflict _Insight_ 1 on them, or _Insight_ 2 if you do not see them as _Obscured_ from your current position.

name: Serpent's Lunge
desc: You wind up before an attack, granting you additional reach with it.
reqs: Must be a Single-Target _Melee_ Attack.
effect: Instead of immediately resolving the attack, become _Charging_. Resolve this Attack at the end of the current _Phase_. Increase the _Reach_ by 1, and add _Reeling_ 1 on a _Graze_+. Treat this Attack as if it was _Charged_ for all other effects.
special: If you would make multiple eligible Attacks during the triggering _Turn_, you may apply this _Gambit_ to any number of them before becoming _Charging_ for 1 _Momentum_. Make all Attacks in any order when you remove _Charging_.

name: Set Feet
desc: You steady yourself as you continue to charge a heavy strike.
trigger: A _Phase_ ends while you are _Charging_.
effect: You gain 1 _Guard_ until the end of the next _Phase_. Additionally, you may _Refresh_ _Grit_/_Poise_ or gain _Vigor_ 2. Finally, if you would normally be required to remove _Charging_ and resolve the effect, you may choose to remain _Charging_ until the end of the next _Phase_.

name: Shepard's Opening
desc: You distract a foe with  your strike, providing an ally the opportunity to slip away.
effect: Choose an ally adjacent to an enemy targeted by this Attack. Grant them a _Free Turn_ where they may _Step_ [_Safe_].
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Choose an additional ally adjacent to an enemy targeted by this Attack. a _Free Turn_ where they may _Step_ [_Safe_]. You may use this effect as many times as you wish, but may only grant an ally a single _Free Turn_.

name: Sheparding Strike
desc: You make a strike with the intent of repositioning a foe, creating space for allies.
effect: If the effect already has _Forced Movement_, increase it by 1 and add _Angled_, or increase it by 2 if it is already _Angled_. If this effect does not have _Forced Movement_, add _Angled_ _Push_ 1. You may instead add _Angled_ _Pull_ 1 if it is a melee attack.

name: Shielding Wave
desc: You pull forth water, creating a temporary shield against an attack.
trigger: You or any ally within _Range_ are Attacked, take Damage, or gain Status.
effect: _Draw_ 1 within _Range_. If you cannot, this _Manuever_ fails. Grant the target of the Attack a _Fleeting_ _Defense_ of their choice, 1 _Guard_ against the triggering _Attack_, and reduce the _Attack Roll_ by 1. Additionally, they gain _Resistance_ to _Fire_ Damage for this Attack. After resolving this, gain _Reeling_ 1.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Create a _Water Veil_ in a space adjacent to the Target after resolving the Effect. _Destroy_ this _Water Veil_ at the end of the _Round_.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance, and Cost is instead 1 + your Spirit's [_Reeling_] _Momentum_. Resolve the above effects and add [_Glancing_]. Resolve the Attack against your Spirit as well. Your Spirit gains _Reeling_ rather than you when used in this way.

name: Shifting Stone
desc: You propel a heavy stone forward, potentially crushing a foe.
effect: _Forceful_ _Slide_ 4 the _Obstacle_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Increase the _Slide_ by 2. You may use this option up to 3 times.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The _Cost_ is now none and Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance. You may choose to have your _Spirit_ remain _Summoned_ adjacent to the _Obstacle_ in a space of your choice. You may use the _Boost_ up to twice at no Cost.

name: Skirmish
desc: You make a sudden attack, seamlessly integrating it with your maneuvering.
effect: Make a _Minor Attack_.
boost:
* 2 _Momentum_: Move is instead _Step_.
* 2 _Momentum_: Choose one:
	* Make an additional _Minor Attack_.
	* Instead, make a _Major Attack_.

name: Slip
desc: You move with practiced ease, sliding across the battlefield with ease.
effect: Once during this _Move_ you may inflict _Exposed_ 1 on a creature that sees you as _Obscured_.
special: Do not remove _Veiled_ until the end of this _Turn_ if it would normally be removed.

name: Sniper's Perch
desc: You find yourself an ideal position, allowing you to better find your targets.
reqs: Must be adjacent to an _Obstacle_ of at least Size 1 or be in a _Fortified_/_Obscured_ space.
effect: Gain 1 _Momentum_, or 2 _Momentum_ if you have not moved since you last used this _Action_ and _Hobbled_ 1. Until you leave your current space, increase the range of your _Ranged_ Attacks by 2. Additionally, you may treat this space as _Fortified_ or, if it is already _Fortified_, it is always at least _Lightly Obscured_.

name: Spectacular Finish
desc: You end a duel in a spectacular fashion, destroying a foe's defenses as you drive them away.
reqs: Attack must only target a creature _Marked_ by you, you and the target must have no other adjacent creatures.
effect: Make this _Attack_ at _Advantage_. Add _Push_ 1, _Break_ [1 _Momentum_/_Poise_], _Exposed_ 1, _Reeling_ 1. Remove _Marked_ from the Target and, if you are _Marked_ by them, also remove that effect. You may not _Mark_ that creature again this _Round_.
special: For each full _Round_ you have had the creature _Marked_, increase the Cost by 1, but also increase all Status inflicted and the cost to Negate by 1. For example, if this creature was _Marked_ for 2 _Rounds_, you would instead inflict _Push_ 3, _Break_ [3 _Momentum_/_Poise_], _Exposed_ 3, _Reeling_ 3.

name: Spikes
desc: You form jagged lines of earth, making the way forward impassable.
effect:
Choose one:
* Choose a _Jagged_ space within range. Replace it with an _Earth Spire_.
* Make 3 contiguous _Earthen_ spaces within Range _Jagged_.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance, and Cost is instead None. Instead, pick a point within _Range_ and, in a _Burst_ 1, make all _Jagged_ spaces _Earth Spire_s and all _Earthen_ spaces _Jagged_.

name: Spirit Summon
desc: Your spirit takes physical form, fighting alongside you.
trigger: _Respite_ begins.
effect: Choose a _Major Source_ within Range. _Summon_ your spirit until the end of the _Round_ to a space adjacent to the _Major Source_. They may use a single _Technique_ and have 1 _AP_ this _Round_. They may use any Basic _Techniques_ or _Maneuvers_, or any _Techniques_ or _Maneuvers_ with the _Spirit_ keyword known by you.
special: If your _Spirit_ was _Summoned_ at the end of the last _Round_, you may instead have it remain in its current space, regardless of _Sources_.

name: Spiritual Interdiction
desc: Your spirit leaps to defend you, taking the brunt of a blow.
cost: [_Reeling_] _Momentum_ (use your spirit's value, not your own)
trigger: You are Attacked, take Damage, or gain Status while adjacent to a _Major Source_.
effect: You may use a single of your spirit's _Defenses_ against this attack. After determining total Damage but before applying your _Guard_, split the Damage in half. Your spirit takes half, and you take the other half. After resolving this, you and your spirit gain _Reeling_ 1.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, you may use this while adjacent to a _Minor Source_.

name: Spread Claws
desc: An insectoid spreads its mighty claws, controlling an area.
effect: For the remainder of the _Phase_ any Movement within your _Reach_ triggers _Opportunity Attack_. Treat your Attacks as 1 faster when used for _Opportunity Attack_.

name: Sprint
desc: You charge forward, limiting your mobility for sheer speed.
reqs: Making a Move without [_Rush_].
effect: Increase the rank of your current Movement (making a _Step_ a _Reposition_, for example), but add [_Rush_]. If the Movement is already _Dash_, instead add [_Rush_, _Breach_].
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Add [_Breach_].

name: Step In
desc: You violently advance as you prepare an assault, lashing out at a foe to keep them near.
trigger: You become _Charging_.
effect: Before you become _Charging_, make a _Minor Attack_. On a _Hit_+, add your choice of _Hobbled_ 1/_Pull_ 2.

name: Stinging Approach
desc: You quickly close the gap, making a strike before foes can retaliate.
reqs: Must be _Phase_ 3 or earlier.
effect: After completing your _Move_, make a _Minor Attack_.

name: Strength of the Pride
desc: You inspire an ally, rallying their defenses while drawing the ire of their attacker.
trigger: An ally within Range takes Damage or gains a Status.
effect: Your ally treats their _Reeling_ as half its current value this _Turn_. If they use a _Defensive_ _Reaction_ against the triggering effect they gain _Courage_ 1, and you may inflict _Marked_ on their attacker.

name: Surging Flourish
desc: You build up a powerful surge of water as you attack, unleashing it in a powerful blast.
reqs: You complete an Attack against a foe within Range 6.
effect: Immediately _Draw_ 1 within Range. Inflict _Push_ 2, _Reeling_ 1 on the original Target.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Increase the _Push_ by 2. You may use this _Boost_ twice.
special: You may instead _Draw_ 2; if you do, add _Soaked_ 1.

name: Swift Manifestation
desc: Your spirit briefly conjures a physical form before unleashing a strike.
effect: Choose an unoccupied _Minor Source_ within Range or an unoccupied space adjacent to a _Major Source_. Immediately use one of your spirit's _Minor Attacks_, originating from that space. If you choose a _Major Source_, gain a +1 _Bonus_. After resolving the Attack you may choose to have your _Spirit_ remain _Summoned_ in the Target space or an adjacent one.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Instead, use one of your spirit's _Major Attacks_.

name: Swift Search
desc: You quickly scan the battlefield, finding an opportunity as quickly as possible.
effect: Place a _Weapon_ within Range. You may not place it adjacent to yourself or an ally. This _Weapon_ is a _Small Improvised_/_Medium Improvised_, is made of the same Material as the Terrain or an adjacent Obstacle (you choose), and has the _Fragile_ and _Opportune_ keywords. Only you and your allies may use this Weapon.
special: Increase the cost of this Stunt by 1 each time you use it. Reduce the cost by 1 at _Respite_.

name: Synchronized Strike
desc: You expertly time an attack with an ally, connecting in rapid succession.
effect: Choose an ally within Range 4. Your ally may immediately make a _Minor Attack_ against the same creature as you. Resolve these _Attacks_ in either order. After resolving both _Attacks_ inflict _Vulnerable_ X, where X is equal to 4 - the difference between your _Attack Rolls_ (minimum 1).
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Instead, choose any ally, ignoring range.

name: Tidal Current
desc: You push and pull the water near you, spreading it across the field.
effect: Gain 1 _Momentum_, then _Draw_ 4 within _Range_. After, place _Wet_ spaces adjacent to the spaces you _Drew_ from, as if you inflicted _Push_/_Pull_ 1 on the original space. You must apply _Push_/_Pull_ for all spaces. If you _Drew_ multiple times from the same _Source_ place _Wet_ spaces in a _Line_ equal to the number of times you _Drew_ from it.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: _Draw_ 2 more. You may repeat this _Boost_.
* 1 _Momentum_: Increase the _Push_/_Pull_ by 1. You may repeat this _Boost_, but may only use it 3 times.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. Range is instead your spirit's _Reposition_ distance, and Cost is instead None. Choose a space within Range that is/is adjacent to a _Minor Source_. Resolve the Effect from that space and freely apply 1 _Momentum_ worth of _Boost_.

name: To Me!
desc: You call an ally toward you, providing them a safe path forward.
effect: Choose an ally that is within their _Step_ distance from you. Grant them a _Free Turn_ where they may _Step_ towards you by the shortest possible distance. You and your ally then both gain _Courageous_ 1.

name: Tumble
desc: You roll forward, moving swiftly and avoiding incoming strikes.
reqs: Have a _Medium Load_ or less.
effect: The next X spaces you Move, where X is up to your _Step_ distance gain [_Safe_, _Breach_, _Rush_]. This Movement may not be broken up in any way.

name: Victory Cry
desc: You let out a triumphant yell, spurring your allies onward.
trigger: Any ally defeats a foe.
effect: Allies in the _Area_ gain _Courageous_ 1 and may immediately Move 1. Until the end of the _Round_, whenever they make an Attack they may remove _Courageous_ 1 to deal +2 _Bonus Damage_ with an Attack.

name: Waiting Stone
desc: You pull a stone loose, preparing it to fire a moment's notice.
reqs: _Attack_ is _Chip Shot_ or _Stone Strike_.
effect: Do not make the Attack now. Instead, choose an _Earthen_ _Obstacle_ or _Jagged_ space within _Range_. At any point after this _Phase_ as a _Reaction_ you may use the triggering Attack, maintaining all original keywords and originating it from the _Obstacle_ or space. When used in this way, ignore the _Close Range_ of these attacks. If the _Obstacle_ or _Terrain_ is removed prior to using this _Reaction_ the effect is lost.

name: Warcry
desc: You let out an inspiring cry, filling your allies with the soul of battle.
effect: Choose an ally within Range and grant them _Vigor_ 2, _Enraged_ 1. You may choose the target of the creature's rage, but they must be within Range 3 of you.
special: If you _Defeated_ an enemy this _Turn_, instead grant _Vigor_ 3, _Enraged_ 2.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Grant your ally a _Free Turn_ where they may _Step_ towards the target of their rage.

name: Warding Step
desc: You step forward, pulling an ally from danger as you do so.
effect: Once during this _Turn_ you may swap spaces with an ally. When you do so, they gain 3 _Vigor_ and may then immediately _Refresh_ or _Recover_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Your ally may _Refresh_ and _Recover_ .

name: Cleansing Wave
desc: You solidify the water that would encase a foe into a protective barrier.
trigger: You or an ally within Range 4 would gain _Soaked_ or ends their _Turn_ in a _Watery_ space.
effect: Your ally may resolve any effects of their choice that would trigger from gaining _Soaked_. After, they do not gain any _Soaked_, but instead 3 _Vigor_ + the _Soaked_ value (1 if used based on a _Watery_ space), and regain 1 _Defense_ of their choice. While your ally has this _Vigor_, they have _Resistance_ to _Flame_ Damage.
special: If you used this ability based on an ally ending their _Turn_ in a _Watery_ space, reduce the space's value by 1.
manifest: Add [_Manifest_]. The Cost is now none and Range is instead your spirit's Reposition distance. Resolve the above effects for both your _Spirit_ and the Target, and instead grant _Vigor_ 6.

name: Wind Tight
desc: You focus your attention on nearby enemies, punishing any bad behavior.
effect: Become _Guarding_. While _Guarding_ in this way, gain 1 _Fleeting_ _Poise_ each _Turn_. You may only make Attacks as a part of _Punish_ _Reactions_, but gain a +2 _Bonus_ to all such Attacks and reduce their cost by 1. You lose this effect if you _Move_.
